detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain__1.sol#204-210) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain__1.sol#207)
detectors.markdown:
[ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain__1.sol#L204-L210) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [_balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain__1.sol#L207)

solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
